title: Eggplant and minced pork stir fry

ingredients.ingredient: sprint onion, green and white parts separated, finely chopped
spicy bean paste 辣豆瓣醬/miso paste

steps: In a pot of boiling water, add salt and eggplant. Let it cook for 3 minutes. Keep the eggplants immersed in the water so that it maintains the purple colour.
When the eggplants are cooked, take it out and let the moisture evaporated off the eggplants.
In a hot pan, heat up some oil and fry the minced pork at medium high heat until the water evaporates and the meat is fragrant.
Add spring onion white, garlic, ginger and chilli. Stir fry for a minute and add a dash of white pepper to give the dish more aromas.
Mix in the sauce and let the meat absorb all the sauce and become darker in colour and shiny.
Pour in the water and let it simmer for about 5 minutes. Keep the sauce bubbling.
When the sauce starts to thicken, add eggplant and let it absorb the sauce too.
Mix in some cornstarch solution and stir to thicken the sauce a bit more.
Turn off the heat and add in the spring onion green. Mix well and serve.
